Articles.Content:
I really wish Ud and Toop where in a planet factory mod! Or if they where randomly placed around the solar system for that matter. You could add Toop as an additional planet around Jool (Seeing as it's the analogue of Iapetus IRL if I recall correctly), and add Ud around Ike! #savethemagicboulder

Ud looks like the UFO on Kerbin so I assume it is one.

As for a planet request if you are so acquiesced to incline, I would love to see a suped-up KSP version of this old classic:

That's Mustafar from Star Wars. You could call it Mustafus or something of your own invention . I didn't know you could draw as well as run an awesome YouTube channel!

Edited December 28, 2014 by Avera9eJoe

I didn't know you could draw as well as run an awesome YouTube channel!

Why, thank you! I didn't notice that last part until now, hehe.

I probably won't make many new planets for now, though. Have to study and stuff.

And now: A size komparison between the Kerbal planets and reality!

http://i.imgur.com/7eiPFVh.jpg

Wow, really puts into perspective how dense Kerbin must be.

Why, thank you! I didn't notice that last part until now, hehe.

I probably won't make many new planets for now, though. Have to study and stuff.

Don't worry that's cool. I'm busy too .
If you're still making these, you should try some of the bodies from the Outer Planets mod. Really excellent planets/moons.

If you're still making these, you should try some of the bodies from the Outer Planets mod. Really excellent planets/moons.

Yeah, I agree.

Other planet packs would be cool too.

Other planet packs would be cool too.

You should do m- nah, you guys know what I'm going to say already. Maybe that's because I love my pack so much...
Seeing this thread again inspired me to draw new moons for Naal.
Could you draw Wexx and it's moons from JoolPlus: Kopernicus Edition?
It would be neat to see some of these designs incorporated into other planet packs. We need more multi-moon planet systems to explore!

It would be neat to see some of these designs incorporated into other planet packs. We need more multi-moon planet systems to explore!

Yeah, good idea! I'm finally getting the hang of KopernicusTech, so if I had the textures making this artwork a reality could be pretty easy!
Felsmak, could you maybe give me the textures for your Kerbol expansion?
I would love to see art drawn of the planets added by the Outer Planets Mod or the Odysseus Pack. No pressure, though; if you don't feel like it, that's fine.

What software are you using to draw these?

Cheers,

RBS.

I didn't realize you had updated so much of your art.

really really great work

What software are you using to draw these?

Cheers,

RBS.

I'm using Photoshop.

Anyway, here's a little picture of Pluto I managed to throw together today!

This might be hard, but could you draw Gargantua and its 3 planets (Separately of course).

Thanks!

DMSP
I've actually done a Gargantua-ish doodle of a black hole before. It's fairly crude, though. That lensing effect gets tricky at the accretion disc.

I've actually done a Gargantua-ish doodle of a black hole before. It's fairly crude, though. That lensing effect gets tricky at the accretion disc.

http://i.imgur.com/WXxHsyu.jpg?1

That's a Doodle?

It's incredible!

+Rep
Now Naal's got an update, too! Just Orbo left.
Ignore the hideous, speculative pictures I've created in the past. Thanks to New Horizons, I finally get to draw the real Pluto!

Very nice indeed.

How about Outer Planets mod, being stockalike and the most popular extension of the stock space?

Thanks! I've actually played a bit with the thought of making full-blown planet textures for all the gas giants in that pack as gifts to its maker(s), just for the heck of it. The problem is just getting around to doing it as well, haha.
Now I want to make up appearances for the other dwarf planets as well. Too bad they'll probably all look like Pluto. Got an idea for Sedna, though!
Yeah, pink-coffe colors dominate these worlds.
